attributes.action: Put chemical castration into place within the UK as it is proven to be successful in many other countries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: paedophilia is an illness, and can not be cured, to safe guard all children, paedophiles must be chemically castrated, before being set free to live in the community. I therefore ask for "chemical castration for all convicted paedophiles." The Depo Provera injection is used in many countries as it diminshes all "urges" and is proven to be 95% effective which is more "humane" and has a higher success rate than physical castration. In other countries it is a parole requirement and our country should also be safeguarding our innocent children by doing the same.
